preview.title: Lineage 2 Essence
preview.subtitle:
You’re not alone!
The guardians will protect you
preview.description: This winter starts with awesome changes such as a new server and a global update, providing a lot of unique opportunities. Don’t waste a chance to start from scratch and be the first to reach the top. Go for it!

newServer.title: A world for new adventures
newServer.description: The new server, Mint, has opened its doors. Here you can feel the competitive spirit once again. Just think about what it’s been like to start your journey anew: the first raid, collections, bosses, weapons, allies... and your first victory. It’s time to rewrite your story!

newContent.title: New PvP system, new experience
newContent.description:
The PvP system will be reworked on all servers:
All bosses will have their own PvP zones with no penalties for dying there. Fight without fear of losing XP or L-Coins.
Some monsters will respawn faster.
You will get more valuable rewards for defeating bosses in special zones. Something to fight for, right?
Resurrection during the clan war will cost half as many L-Coins. So, don’t hesitate to challenge enemy guilds!

footer.title:
Start playing
for free
footer.tg_bot: Get notifications about trading deals and even character deaths in real-time
footer.wiki: Everything about the world of Lineage 2 Essence
